name: Mixnode
description: Mixnode is the Mixcloud's unofficial desktop app

scripts.start: $(npm bin)/concurrently 'npm run start-react' '$(npm bin)/wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=producion $(npm bin)/concurrently '$(npm bin)/wait-on rm -rf ./build && npm run build-react' '$(npm bin)/wait-on build/index.html && npm run build-electron'
